query: What did we decide about authentication?

items.name: Alice
items.content: I think we should use JWT tokens for authentication. They're stateless and work well with our microservices architecture.

items.name: Bob
items.content: Agreed on JWT. We can use the python-jose library for token handling. It has good support for RS256 signing.

items.name: Alice
items.content: Let's also add refresh token support. Short-lived access tokens (15 min) with longer refresh tokens (7 days) for better security.

items.name: Charlie
items.content: Don't forget we need to handle token revocation. Maybe a Redis blacklist for invalidated tokens?

items.name: Bob
items.content: Good point Charlie. We should also implement rate limiting on the auth endpoints to prevent brute force attacks.

items.name: Diana
items.content: Hey team, the new coffee machine is installed in the break room. It has an espresso option now!

items.name: Eve
items.content: Has anyone seen the latest deployment metrics? The response times look a bit high.

items.name: Frank
items.content: I'm working on the new dashboard UI. Should be ready for review by Friday.

items.name: Grace
items.content: Reminder: Team lunch tomorrow at noon. Please RSVP in the calendar invite.

items.name: Henry
items.content: The database migration script is ready. We should schedule downtime for next week.

items.name: Ivy
items.content: Can someone review PR #234? It's been open for 3 days now.

items.name: Jack
items.content: The CI pipeline is failing on the main branch. Looking into it now.

items.name: Karen
items.content: New feature request from the product team: dark mode support for the mobile app.

items.name: Leo
items.content: Anyone up for a game of ping pong during lunch break?

items.name: Mike
items.content: The load balancer config has been updated. Traffic should be more evenly distributed now.

items.name: Nancy
items.content: I found a bug in the search functionality. Creating a ticket now.

items.name: Oscar
items.content: The new intern starts Monday. Can someone prepare the onboarding docs?

items.name: Paula
items.content: Sprint retrospective meeting moved to 3pm. Please update your calendars.

items.name: Quinn
items.content: The API documentation needs updating. Some endpoints are missing descriptions.

items.name: Rachel
items.content: Just pushed the new error handling code. Tests are passing locally.
